title: Pipe Spring National Monument: Operating Hours & Seasons
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Operating Hours & Seasons              Operating Hours & Seasons      NOTE: Pipe Spring National Monument is on Mountain Standard Time all year.        The fort, called Winsor Castle, during the summer at Pipe Spring. NPS image  Summer (May through August): Monument grounds and Visitor Center/Museum are open 8:00 a.m. to 5:00 p.m. Tours of Winsor Castle are offered regularly throughout the day. Most demonstrations, talks or walks are offered during the morning hours.        The fort, called Winsor Castle, during the winter at Pipe Spring. NPS image  Winter (September through April): Monument grounds and Visitor Center/Museum are open 8:30 a.m. to 4:30 p.m. Tours of Winsor Castle are offered as needed on the hour from 9:00 a.m. to 3:00 p.m. Closed Thanksgiving, Christmas, and New Year's days.
